name: Getting Into It [Team 3]
description:
Getting Into It is our Lord or the Rings themed parody game of the infamous 'Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy'. Designed to be a punishing climbing game that tests peoples Endurance to climb mount doom as a hobbit trapped in a barrel having nothing but a hoe to navigate up the hill, through practice players should be able to jump, swing, climb and fly with unity's 2D collision and physics systems.

Credits:

Kane Piggott, Annabel Maw, Jake Sharples, Issac Wai and Franchesca Chan

Jake Sharples TikTok launch Video
